data.title: North American Baptist Conference
data.meta_description: Pictured is a special commissioning prayer time at the 6th Annual Conference of the Zomi Baptist Churches of America.
data.text:
Pictured is a special commissioning prayer time at the 6th Annual Conference of the Zomi Baptist Churches of America.

Brian Kaylor, BWA Resolutions Committee Chair, gathers with other BWA leaders for a time of prayer at the 2022 BWA Annual Gathering in Birmingham, Alabama, USA.

Gina Stewart, the first woman elected President of Lott Carey Baptist Foreign Mission Society, speaks at the conventionâ€™s 125th Annual Session last year in New Orleans.

We also give thanks for Dallas Baptist University (DBU) in Dallas, Texas, USA, and Howard Payne University (HPU) in Brownwood, Texas, USA. Approved by the General Council at the 2023 BWA Annual Gathering, DBU and HPU are the first educational institution BWA Member Partners. General Secretary Elijah Brown is pictured with HPU President Cory Hines and his wife Melinda at the Currie-Strickland Distinguished Lectures in Christian Ethics Series earlier this year.
